title: Rebellion: The Gospel of the Keeper
description: In Botusia, the realm is always ruled by the queen, and the gods in Botusia have long since ruled she has a commoner as her Keeper and Protector when she is the heir-princess at womanhood. Princess Elinia has just reached womanhood and the gods have anointed the stable-hand Artolo to be her Keeper. Soon, a rebellion is fomented in a duchy and Elinia and Artolo discover love and passion, and experience war and bravery and all the cruel kindnesses of the gods.
author: Patrick Heffernan
